Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
RecordingInterface Interface which is used for updating the GUI
 

Class Summary
AboutBox Displays the About Box Dialog
AdjustMic Allows the user to monitor the status of the microphone The monitor is useful when the application is being setup for the first time
AppFileFilter File Filter when browsing for application
CaptureSound This class captures sound for two seconds and allows the application to retrieve it.
CircularArray Circular array used for continious recording
ConfirmationDialog Confirmation Dialog displays a progress bar with yes, no and cancel buttons.
ContiniousRecording Continious Recording allows the user to initiate the recording phase via voice This class has lower accuracy than expected and should be used with minimal background noise
hotkey hotkey is a class which will allow global hotkeys by using C++ Native Calls
InsertNewApplication Creates a new dialog so that the user can record a new entry
JVMStatus Displays a small dialog which shows the status of the Java Virtual Machine
LaunchApplication Launches applications
Library Library Class is responsible for all communications between the application and the library on disk All features are saved as a vector.
LibraryModel A Table Model which is responsible for populating the library table
Playback Plays the given audio file or inputstream
RecognitionThread This class initilizes a thread to record the users phrase and then recoginizing it
Recognize Recognizes the best matched item compared to a WAVFeature
RecordComputer Records the word computer and inserts it to the library
RecordingPopup Creates and shows a progress of the recording status
RunApplication Starts the application
SaveWavFile Static method which writes the audioInputStream to file
SettingsWin Creates a dialog to display the user's settings
SplashWin Creates a Splash screen
UpdateInfo Thread which updates the status every 1 second
UserOptions This class is responsible for retrieving user settings properties
UserWin Creates and displays the application window
WAVFeature Extracts features from audio Byes
YesNoLibraryWin Allows user to record yes and no and then insert the new responses to library
